```{r libraries}
library(tidyverse)
library(nflscrapR)
theme_set(theme_light())
```

```{r data}
pbp2019 <- readRDS(url('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/guga31bb/nflfastR-data/master/data/play_by_play_2019.rds'))
```

```{r minnesota}
min_pbp2019 <- pbp2019 %>%
  filter(posteam == 'MIN')

min_pbp2019 %>%
  filter(!is.na(play_type)) %>%
  group_by(down) %>%
  summarise(count = n(),
            pass = sum(play_type == 'pass'),
            run = sum(play_type == 'run'))

```
